title: - Specialist for plastic, aesthetic and reconstructive surgery.
philosophy: Plastic surgery is like medicine meets art. Like an artist, I take immense pleasure both from the process and the result. Yet, as a medical professional, the pure artistic aspect  alone is not my only interest. Instead, my philosophy is to preserve the perfect balance between beauty and well-being to create a long-lasting harmony of health and beauty. To provide my clients a way to reach their true selves.
